name: IT ROAMS
description:
You are stuck in a maze and it seems like you're not alone.

Inspired by the "Monster Maze 3D" game from 1981

Still somewhat of a prototype, don't know where to take it yet but will probably add new things soon.

HOW TO PLAY

- Find 6 floppy disks scattered around the map

- Once all disks are found, find an exit door

- Keep moving, the monster is following you

- You can't hear the monster

If you have ny problems with fullscreen, press F11

CONTROLS

[W] - Move Forward

[A] / [D] - Rotate Left / Right

There's currently no way to pause the game, sorry about that.

CREDITS

FancySnacks - everything

Codeman38 - Font "KongText"

Built using Unreal Engine 4
